nikan anga ridda ganimata nohaki nisa saha "ane oya me nathi prashna hada ganne nathuwa inna" yana mage birindage awawadayata garu kirimak lesa dan mama ahena banak/pirithak/kawiyak asagena gedarata wi sitimi.ma awata athi pansal ekakwath shabda wikashana yanthra sandaha balapathra gena nomathi bawath, ee wagema ra 12.00 pasu eliwena thek "sarwarathrika" shabda kirimata balapathra dan nodena bawath hondina ma danimamita awurudu 5 kata udadi pansal/palli walata thibune asalwasinge wenas awashyatha walata garu karamin, anunta hiriharayak nowanase thamange katayuthu kirime nohakiyawa pilibanda sadacharathmaka aduwak pamani.

pemwathiyage kammulata pahara dun pemwathekuta kolambaa mahadhikaranayen apa niyama wi thibenawa.melesa apa niyama kerune dematagoda pradeshaye padinchi 22 hawiridi santhriwel sendil kumara namathi tharunayekutayi.ohu kotahena pradeshaye swarnabharana welanda salaka sewaya karanneku wana bawa sandahan.owunge wiwahaya mema wasare aga sidukirimata dina niyama kara ganunada eya labana wasarata kal damimata thaman yojana kala heyin melesa pemwatha wisin thamanta kammul paharak dun bawayi kotahena pradeshaye padinchi 20 hawiridi ema pemwathiya wisin kotahena polisiyata paminili kara aththe.ella kala ema kammul pahara hethuwen thamange muhunata saha nahayata thuwala siduwi rohalgathawimata siduwu bawayi paminilikariya sandahan kale.pasuwa kotahena polisiya wisin danda nithi sangrahaye waganthi yatathe sakakaru adhikaranaya wetha idiripath kara thibenawa.idiripath wu karunu salakillata gath kolambaa athireka mahesthrath dulani amarasinha wisin withthikaruta dadi lesa awawada kota ohu rupiyal 50,000ka sharira apayak matha nidahas kirimata niyoga kara thibuna.nawatha paminilikariyata thadana pidana sidu kalahoth mema naduwa awasan wanathuru rakshitha bandhanagara gatha karana bawayi athireka mahesthrathwariya withthikaruta danum di aththe.
